import os print(os.path) class person(object): """"This is a person Class for Users""" def __init__(self, fname, lname, email): """create a new person""" pass def del(self, id): """delete an employee""" pass def email(self, id): """send email to person""" pass if __name__ === '__main__': p = person("John", "Smith", "jm@me.com") print(p)
